casebody.head_matter:
In re Autographic Register Co.
(No. 2311)
United States Court of Customs and Patent Appeals,
April 14, 1930
William L. Symons (Arthur A. Johnson of counsel) for appellant.
T. A. Hostetler for the Commissioner of Patents.
[Oral argument March 10, 1930, by Mr. Symons and Mr. Hostetler]
Before Graham, Presiding Judge, and Bland, Hatfield, Garrett, and Lenkoot,. Associate Judges
